column1: #FORMAT=WebAnno TSV 3.2
#T_SP=webanno.custom.Referent|entity|infstat
#T_RL=webanno.custom.Coref|type|BT_webanno.custom.Referent
#Text=BW : Sure .
#Text=That ’s what I mean about some people having naturally quirky voices .
#Text=You ’ve heard people in your life , like you meet a girl , a full-grown woman , who goes [ in high pitched squeal ] , “ I wanted to ask you . ”
#Text=And you go , ' Drop the act .
#Text=Is this a put-on ? '
#Text=And I go , “ Shit , you should be doing cartoons ! ”
#Text=" It was a horror chamber where I grew up "
#Text=DS :
#Text=Is how you developed your talent when you were younger based upon imitating others ?
#Text=You would hear things that would leave impressions on you and you would want to imitate them ?
#Text=But why would you want to imitate them ?
#Text=BW : Because I had no role models .
#Text=My dad was a certifiable psycho and he made my life a living hell and it was a horror chamber where I grew up and when I grew up .
#Text=The guy used to beat the daylights out of me left and right , for any random reason .
#Text=He was a raving alchie .
#Text=I grew up with him making fun of me .
#Text=I was forced to retreat into a world where I could n’t get hurt or beat up or anything like that .
#Text=[ My father ] used to beat the daylights out of me left and right , for any random reason .
#Text=He was a raving alchie .
#Text=I grew up with him making fun of me .
#Text=I was forced to retreat into a world where I could n’t get hurt or beat up or anything like that .
#Text=— Billy West on beginning to do voices
#Text=DS : It was escapism ... ?
#Text=BW : Well yeah .
#Text=You gotta understand , it was like I was a little kid .
#Text=I ’m not a magical being .
#Text=My dad tried to kill me about fifteen times .
#Text=DS : So when you would escape into those voices , you felt a sense of safety ?
#Text=BW : Yes . '
#Text=Cause I was surrounded by things that would n’t be a threat to me .
#Text=DS : And things that you could control through your own voice .
#Text=BW : Yes .
#Text=DS : Whereas you could n’t control what an alcoholic authority figure was going to do .
#Text=BW : I was like an alien ; I was an observation unit , trying to study the human condition , not consciously , but because I had to .
#Text=I could tell you the kind of night I was going to have from the sound of the key in the door or the way the car pulled up .
#Text=I was hyper vigilant .
#Text=So all I was , was this unit from space that had nothing but data gathering and sensory equipment .
#Text=DS : What was your dad ’s reaction to your doing voices ?
#Text=BW :
#Text=It did n’t register on the radar because , number one , I was n’t really doing it in the time I spent with him .
#Text=The other thing was that he was a frustrated talent .
#Text=He could sit down at the piano and just start playing it , having no lessons or training .
#Text=He could do dialogs and he could do voices .
#Text=He was very funny , you know , among his friends and all that .
#Text=He was also a musician , a drummer .
#Text=And I became a musician except I was n’t a drummer , I was a guitar player .
#Text=The thing is , he could never make it pay .
#Text=All he had was a string of jobs .
#Text=Driving a beer truck then driving a soda pop truck then driving an ice cream truck .
#Text=You know what I mean ?
#Text=Like a Ralph Kramden kind of thing .
